Try for free
SEE WHAT YOU CAN BUILD WITH PUBNUB

2000+ CUSTOMERS AROUND THE WORLD LOVE PUBNUB

What makes PubNub unique

ONE PLATFORM
Limitless engagement

We provide a single platform to build any combination of real-time features, including chat, live audience engagement, multi-user collaboration, device control, data streaming, and geolocation /dispatch - all managed and monitored from a single dashboard.

INFINITELY SCALABLE
Globally secure,
regionally compliant

Our global network of Points of Presence (PoPs) provide huge scale, 99.999% SLAs, regional compliance, and redundancy to ensure every user and device gets quick real-time experiences.

IN-FLIGHT FUNCTIONS
Your code, deployed

Build code to route, filter, transform, augment, and aggregate real-time messages or respond directly to HTTP requests instantly (<10ms) as they route through our massively redundant, low latency edge messaging network.

PubNub by the numbers

99.999%

UPTIME SLA

﹥800 Million

DEVICE CONNECTIONS PER MONTH

﹥3 Trillion

API CALLS PER MONTH

15 POPs

AROUND THE WORLD

HEAR WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS HAVE TO SAY

“We’ve delivered billions of messages through PubNub — that is something that we’ve been very proud of. Being able to have that reliability allows us to focus on building a great user experience without having to scale every single part of our infrastructure.”

Kyle Heller, Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer at Veeps

Build apps with engaging and effective real-time experiences

LIVE AUDIENCE ENGAGEMENT

From live events to social workouts, in-app chat and push notifications redefine these group interactions.

Learn more >

CHAT

Provide the public, group, and 1-1 chat experiences your users need for any device, built the way you want.

Learn more >

MULTI-USER COLLABORATION

Bring the team together with virtual classrooms, document collaboration tools, and more.

Learn more >

DEVICE CONTROL

Realtime IoT device control and monitoring made simple. Connect, monitor and control devices remotely.

Learn more >

DATA STREAMING

Stream data in real-time, create and share live displays, and enable new data-driven experiences.

Learn more >

GEOLOCATION & DISPATCH

APIs to track your fleet’s cars, check on your drivers’ deliveries, provision orders, or even matchmake in dating apps.

Learn more >

See your use case in action

Take a self-guided demo with PubNub’s Showcase App. Explore some of the platform’s most popular features like Group Chat, Presence, Polls, Interactive Whiteboards, Location Sharing, and more!


See a Demo
